ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: I have 8 backpacks full of words in the bank sigh . . . need more room! also I was only able to put 1 pt into specialization in each school of magic but they
ygData.messageBody:
I have 8 backpacks full of words in the bank sigh . . .
need more room!

also I was only able to put 1 pt into specialization in each school of magic
but they go up fast on their own.
I should go back and try to train more now that I am 21st lvl

Any gnomes tried tinkering?


----- Original Message -----
From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 13, 1999 7:17 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Research


> From: wolfie <lachdanan@...>
>
> I find that I must do my own Necro research. I am L16, Gnome. Could
> someone share the basic approach to research wirh me? I know of one site
> (URL) that has information on what words make what spell. Would anyone
> share any others? I have access to lots of words. I think I spend 1
> training point in research (all that is permitted) , buy some book or
> container, put words in it, and do some kind of action to make a spell.
If
> it fails ( and I imagine they all do) words are gone? How do you store
> same words (stackable like fish) ? Where are best places, and mobs, to
get
> words? Do I have to be successful at making L1-L15 spells before I have a
> hope of making L16 ones? Can I make L24 spells before I am L24?
>
> I need Restless Bones, Feign Death, and Aura Banshee. Some say at least
> the 1st and 3d can be bought from vendors but I have no idea where? Is
L16
> way to low to make L16 spells?
>
>
